‚ÄúIt‚Äôs funny and terrifying because it conveys a certain cold truth that climate scientists and others who understand the full depth of the climate emergency are living every day.‚Äù ‚ÄìPeter Kalmus, climate scientist #DontLookUp https://t.co/TXxLFHYVVT
His teaching and writing inspires everyone dedicated to protecting our world. My heart goes out to his family.

The world lost a true hero for the planet when Dr. E.O. Wilson passed away - "the Darwin of the 20th century", prolific writer, pioneer of groundbreaking new concepts in biology, and one of the towering intellects of our time.
His work helped show us how to protect the environment. My thoughts are with his loved ones.

Dr. Thomas Lovejoy passed away ‚Äì the ‚ÄúGodfather of Biodiversity‚Äù, creator of the debt-for-nature swap concept, mentor and teacher of many, leader in linking biodiversity and climate change, and first to put Amazonia on the conservation map.
